definition: خشب II to lignify, become woody or woodlike; to line, face or cue with wood, to panel, wainscot (هـ 8.tb.) V to lignify, become woody or woodlike; to become bard, still, firm, rigid; to stiffen, freeze (e.g., with panic) خشب kašab pl. خشب akšāb wood, lumber, timber │خشب الأنبياء k. al-anbiyā’ guaiacum wood, lignum vitae
